title: S12 Ep32: Possessed Playthings: Haunted Toys
itunes:title: Possessed Playthings: Haunted Toys
description:
Dave welcomes Ross Allison to Beyond The Darkness to take a chilling walk down childhood memories with unnerving games that skirt the edges of darkness, antiques with spirits that have never let them go, locations where ghosts still play with toys and, of course, creepy dolls that are a bit too lifelike.

Ross Allison: https://aghostinvestigations.com/

http://www.rossallisondotcom.wordpress.com/
